snippet: A group of former lawmakers and government officials gathered this week in the capital to discuss what they said was secrecy surrounding aliens and unidentified flying objects.
abstract: Group of former lawmakers and government officials have concluded week-long event in Washington, DC, to discuss what they call government secrecy surrounding aliens and unidentified flying objects.
lead_paragraph: A group of former lawmakers and government officials gathered this week in the capital to discuss what they said was secrecy surrounding aliens and unidentified flying objects.

headline.seo: Panel Convenes in Washington to Discuss Aliens
headline.main: Visitors From Outer Space, Real or Not, Are Focus of Discussion in Washington
headline.print_headline: Visitors From Outer Space, Real or Not, Are Focus of Discussion in Washington
